document_data.name: Cathliira
document_data.home:
[[Elturel]], [[Western Heartlands]]
[[Waterdeep]], [[Sword Coast North]]It is unknown if Cathliira hailed ''from'' Elturel or went ''to'' Elturel.
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cathliira''' was a female [[human]] [[wizard]] living in [[Elturel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

She was an apprentice of [[Kappiyan Flurmastyr]] of [[Waterdeep]] and was a notable sorceress and accomplished mage before the 1360s DR.
